page.title: 03LOWER HAYES FARM
page.content: They have had the farm for three generations.They have{300 acres,}120 for arable and the rest for dairy.They have 4 tractors and a digger on the farm,the rest they hire.They have a generator for the milking parlour in case of a power cut. The family get up at 7.00 am and finish at 7.30 pm on winter nights,and 10.30 pm on summer evenings.Â£51,000 are spent on the farm a year.They make a profit of approximately Â£30,000 per year.The land is good for crops.There have been no main problems of flooding.There are{only cows}on the farm.They have no Decoy pools.They do use herbicides and pesticides and artificial fertilisers.They have owned the farm for 28 years.
